definition: the time/the right time/weather conditions/destiny/course of time/heaven's natural order
the time is right, geographical and social conditions are favorable (idiom); a good time to go to war
pinyin: tian1 shi2 di4 li4 ren2 he2

definition: going with nature and the seasons (TCM)

sentences.english: Heaven and earth never agreed better to frame a place for man's habitation.
sentences.chinese: 天时地利，已造就最好的一个地方，给人居住。

sentences.english: On day 28, the sarcoma tumors under the skin were recovered from the mice and weighed.
sentences.chinese: 在第28天时，皮下肿瘤从老鼠身上取出并且称重。

sentences.english: He smiled coldly at the angel.
At that time the king called ZuYi, days of the contingency, made him very upset.
sentences.chinese: 那时的国君叫祖乙，天时风云的不测，使他很苦恼。

sentences.english: And Apple is in the right place at the right time.
sentences.chinese: 苹果公司正逢天时地利。

sentences.english: The Heavenly Famous Garden complex shows how quickly the market has run into a wall.
sentences.chinese: 天时名苑楼盘显示了楼市是如何的急转直下。

sentences.english: For that time, it was the wrong guy.
sentences.chinese: 爱是天时地利的迷信，真的吗？

sentences.english: Sometimes things come along at the perfect time and it's sort of fate.
sentences.chinese: 有时候一个完美的作品天时地利人和缺一不可。

sentences.english: At the 3~rd day, the vacuole-like changes widened.
sentences.chinese: 手术后第3天时可见空泡样改变范围扩大。

sentences.english: Heshun, a small township in west Yunnan, has favorable climatic and geographic conditions and unity of people.
sentences.chinese: 和顺，一座滇西小镇，占尽了天时地利人和。

sentences.english: Shigella flexneri could be detected within 30 days.
sentences.chinese: 福氏志贺菌30天时仍能检出。
只不过是天时地利罢了。

sentences.english: Ding was wounded in Yama, Zhao day ask him to save a mountain.
sentences.chinese: 丁日被阎罗王打伤，遇兆天时求他救一山。

sentences.english: Thanks to the advantages of good timing, geographical convenience and good human relations, its success is a historical necessity.
sentences.chinese: 具备“天时地利人和”的优势是百色起义成功的原因。

sentences.english: This hot weather would die me?
Nathan Wang watched our filming materials for 4Ts and then said he appreciate the one with a bunch of silly geese.
sentences.chinese: 王天时看完所有素材以后最喜欢一群蠢鹅的素材。

definition: favorable location/in the right place/productivity of land
the time is right, geographical and social conditions are favorable (idiom); a good time to go to war
pinyin: tian1 shi2 di4 li4 ren2 he2

definition: favorable geographical and social conditions (idiom); good location and the people satisfied
going with nature and the seasons (TCM)
meteorological or astronomical phenomenon (e.g. rainbow or eclipse)
planning is with man, accomplishing with heaven (idiom); Man proposes but God disposes.
pinyin: mou2 shi4 zai4 ren2 , cheng2 shi4 zai4 tian1

definition: constant (math.)/quota/fixed number (e.g. of places on a bus)/fixed quantity (e.g. load of truck)/destiny
not a single one is dispensable/can't do without either
